experiences.name: Local Freelance Project
experiences.description:
A platform that allows entrepreneurs and organizations to connect and find a match in project funding.
Worked on the overhaul of the site, through a UX figma design implementation.
Worked involved the construction of reusable components that could make the site cohesive and cohesive.
The project uses next.js with MUI theming through emotion.js.
Tools used for this were RTKquery to solve the responsiveness of the site while handling the need to avoid stale data through the form filling sections.
